Style.Description: 'Body' is used to control the color of the outer page border, and to set the basic parameters for all text and links on all pages.
'input[text]' is used to control the style for all text boxes on all pages.
'textarea' is used to control the style for all text areas on all pages.
'.button' is used to control the style for all submit buttons on all pages.
'Button (Hover)' is used to control the style for all buttons on all pages when mouse is hovered upon them.
'Button (Active)' is used to control the style for all active buttons on all pages.
'a.button' is used to control the style for all link buttons on all pages.
'Link Button (Hover)' is used to control the style for all link buttons on all pages when mouse is hovered upon them.
'Link Button (Active)' is used to control the style for all active link buttons on all pages.
'Hyperlink' is used to control the style for all hyperlinks on all pages.
'Hyperlink (Hover)' is used to control the style for all hyperlinks on all pages when mouse is hovered upon them.
'Hyperlink (Active)' is used to control the style for all active hyperlinks on all pages.
'#storeHeader' is used to control the styles of page header area
'#leftColumn' is used to control the styles of left column area of page.
' #rightColumn' is used to control the right column styles of page.
' #mainColumn' is used to control the styles of content area of page.
'Widget' is used to control the styles of widget areas of page.
'Widget Header' is used to control the styles of the header of widget area.
'Widget Caption' is used to control the styles of the heading within header of widget area.
'Widget Contents' is used to control the styles of the content of widget area.
This style controls the container for a grid of product items.
This is the content area that holds the items.
This contains an individual item in the grid.
This contains the thumbnail image for the item in the grid.
This contains the linked name of the item in the grid.
' #footer' is used to control the styles of footer area of page.
Additional styles allow you to modify the source for styles which are not mapped to have designer support.
